functions.name: askUserForFilenameFormat
functions.description: Ask the user which format in the filenames should be applied when saving attachments.

functions.name: askUserForDestinationFolder
functions.description: Ask the user where the extracted attachments should be saved to.

functions.name: getListLimitedTo
functions.description: Reduce a long list to the given number of entries, where last entry tells about more entries to exist.

parameters.name: longList
parameters.description: the list which might be truncated

parameters.name: limitTo
parameters.description: Optional number of entries of the resulting list, defaults to a reasonable value.

functions.name: getFilePathForAttachment
functions.description: Determines the file path to be used for saving the attachment. It checks whether the filename has been used before and makes it unique by adding a^ counter.

functions.name: saveFileTo
functions.description: Saves a file to a given path.

functions.name: showAlertToUser
functions.description: Shows a simple alert pop-up to the user.

functions.name: showPromptToUser
functions.description: Shows a simple prompt pop-up to the user.
